pwpmines.Last player wins: The last player standing wins the game.
pwpmines.Fist player wins: The first player to leave the game wins the game.

tos.Terms of service_heading: Terms of service and privacy policy
tos.Terms of service_text: Please read the terms of the site carefully. By using this site you agree to all of the conditions listed below.
tos.Age Requirement_text: To be eligible to play on rustyloot.gg you confirm that you are 18 years of age or older. This website is only available to users who are of legal age to gamble in the country that they reside in. You must confirm your age before you may deposit and play any game-mode featured on our site.
tos.Website information_text: This website is for entertainment purposes only. Our goal is to be the first community centered Rust website creating a fair and safe environment.
tos.Restricted Regions_text: Rustyloot.gg is only to be used in permitted jurisdictions. It is your responsibility to check if you are in a region that prohibits rustyloot.gg's gaming services. You must also make sure that you comply with any additional local laws. We do not claim that rustyloot.gg is available in all regions.
tos.Affiliation_text: Rustyloot.gg is not affiliated with Steam. Steam is a registered trademark of Valve Corporation. All other trademarks such as the Rust logo, Rust, Rust Skins, and all other trademarks are all owned by Facepunch Studios.
tos.Payments_text: Our site offers no way to withdraw real money. We do not provide opportunities to win real money. The item's prices on our site do not represent any real world value. We do not offer any refunds for virtual skins deposited under any circumstances.
tos.Lost Items_text: If any loss occurs during a bet, you have 16 hours from the bet time to make a claim by emailing us at 'business@rustyloot.gg' or contacting our Discord support, after which these items will be considered forfeited.
tos.Limitation on Liabilities_text: In no event will Power Technology Solutions Holdings LTD.'s service providers, employees, it’s affiliates, developers, contractors, designers, and other part time employees be held liable for damages of any kind, under any legal circumstances, arising from your use, or inability to use the website, or any content on the website. This includes direct or indirect damages including but not limited to personal injury, loss of profits, loss of data, loss of savings. The rest of the contract does not affect any liability which cannot be excluded or limited by applicable liability law.
tos.Dispute_text: All inquiries relating to rustyloot.gg and the interpretation of these terms shall be governed and enforced in accordance with the laws of Ireland.
tos.In the event_text: In the event of any dispute arising between Power Technology Solutions Holdings LTD. and you, the parties will make best efforts to solve such dispute in good faith within a reasonable time. In case that you and rustyloot.gg, owned by Power Technology Solutions Holdings LTD., do not resolve the dispute, you or Power Technology Solutions Holdings LTD. may seek legal routes with the courts situated in Ireland.

provably_fair.We use the popular: We use the popular third party system Random.org as an independent source to determine the outcome of most of our games. Random.org allows anyone to verify the true randomness of a generated seed that is used.
provably_fair.When a round: When a round is created we generate our own hash of the result. This Hash is then displayed on all gamemodes and shown before the round starts. After a round has been played you can verify the results by using the form below. Copy the Random and Signature data and click on this
provably_fair.To verify all: to verify all information & the rounds. To generate the hash you simply SHA256 hash the secret:roll:signature as shown below.
provably_fair.When updating:
When updating your Server seed you will find the old server seed decrypted in the Profile popup. Use this server seed for round validation.
Nonce is reset after a server seed update. The below Psuedo code below. Use Javascript
provably_fair.Rights should be: Rights should be the same array as the one in the PF popup
provably_fair.Roll should be: Roll should be the same as roll in the PF popup

footer.Rustyloot is the finest: Rustyloot is the finest Rust gambling site bringing you the best designed gamemodes alongside the best rewards!
footer.Description: Play thousands of exciting, provably fair games and get the best odds on 50+ sports. Deposit with PayPal, Visa, Ethereum, Bitcoin, Litecoin & more. Featuring instant withdrawals and tons of rewards every day!
